title.rendered: ClinLab Staffing Named to the 2017 FAST 50 List of Top Fastest Growing Private Companies in Massachusetts

content.rendered:
Wayland, MA, April 10, 2017 — ClinLab Staffing, a leading staffing and recruiting firm for life science, pharmaceutical, biotechnology and preclinical organizations, today announced that it has been named to the Boston Business Journal’s 2017 FAST 50 List of Top Fastest Growing Private Companies in Massachusetts for the first time.

“We are happy to named to the BBJ FAST 50 List,” said ClinLab Staffing CEO, Andrius Montvila. “I am proud of our incredible team and look forward to adding talent in 2017 and 2018. Our success is built on the life sciences boom Massachusetts has incubated over the last 10 years. We feel very confident hiring new staff and expanding our offices in 2017.”

The Fast 50 winners were selected and ranked based on a formula that counts revenue growth in the preceding three years. The numbers are crunched and analyzed by the Business Journal’s Research Department and CPA firm Withum, a Fast 50 partner.

About ClinLab Staffing

ClinLab Staffing is a leader in the scientific staffing & executive search industry. Headquartered in Boston, Massachusetts, ClinLab is committed to driving workforce solutions for startup, mid-sized and large life science, biotech, medical and scientific companies. With an unrivaled network, a deep expertise and broad market intelligence, our team of seasoned client managers and recruiters are uniquely positioned to provide industry-leading services and support. For more information, please visit www.clinlabstaffing.com
